title: Man killed in Scioto County crash 5 hours ago
content: A Wheelersburg man is dead after authorities said he lost control of his vehicle.    SCIOTO COUNTY, OHIO (WCHS/WVAH) —    A Wheelersburg man is dead after authorities said he lost control of his vehicle, then crashed into a culvert.    It happened on Dogwood Ridge, near Edmond Drive in Scioto County, around 9:20 p.m. Friday, according to the Portsmouth Post of the Ohio State Highway Patrol.    Authorities said Michael Brady Rose, 41, was heading southwest when he lost control of his Chevrolet Cobalt. The vehicle overturned, partially ejecting Rose.    He was pronounced dead at the scene. Investigators said he was not wearing a seatbelt.    The crash remains under investigation.
